text: (nabiye! min) pasuvada, oba samaga tarka kalahot (ovunta) “niyata vasayenma ma allahta (allahge niyogayanta) sampurnayenma avanata vunemi. (esema) mava anugamanaya karannanda (avanata vuha)” yayi pavasa, dharmaya pahala karanu læbuvantada (piliru aradhana karana) nugatungenda “obat (e andamatama) allahta sampurnayenma avanata vannehuda?”yi vimasanu. (esema) ovunda avanata vuvahot, niyata vasayenma ovunda rju margaya at kara gatha. tavada ovun pratiksepa kara hæriyahot (e venuven oba duk novanu. oba apage duta mehevara ovunta) genahæra dækvimama oba kerehi anivaryaya vi ætteya. allah tama vahalunva avadhanayen yutuva balanneku vasayen sitinneya
